channel.title: Development team required for rs-remake 07
channel.description:
Hey guys, I am starting a development team to bring back the good old days of RuneScape back in 2007. I am aiming to remake the old RuneScape, this inclues all the skills, quests and minigames.
I require 3-4 programmers and 1-2 web developers i am looking foward to working with you to make a popular remake of the 2007 RuneScape.
The benefits are mods status, a share of the donations and a share of credits
Application:
Name: What is your position, programmer, webs designer: How many years of Experience: Goal for helping on this rsps: Skype Name:
Contact me etiher on Moparscape pm or reply or on skype name is xprox-12
